entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Pemberton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:22 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Fog near Pemberton early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
